description: Kaos has been the consort for quite a while now, but she has been slacking when it comes to her slave duties. As head slave, she is responsible for maintaining the House and overseeing the other slaves. The Steward has notice this and after consulting with other members of the House, it's time to demote kaos. Throughout the night the guests are enjoying the company of themselves, with sadistic play and kinky sex all over the House.
title: Consort Demotion
